creator: hamidsafdari@hotmail.com
text: I'm a web developer and every time I build my webapp and copy it to the tomcat webapp folder, I have to stop tomcat, copy my war file and then start tomcat again. I do all that using my mouse. It takes time. I really think putting some kind of option in the settings pane for the tomcat that let's us specify shortcuts for that or other possible operations would really fasten things up.

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
The GUI app that provides the setting pane is part of the Apache Commons Daemon project. You'll need to open an enhancement request in that project's Jira:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/DAEMON
